Label: util_TNC_TRANSIT_operating_cost
Expression: @ivt_cost_multiplier * df.ivot * np.maximum(TNC_single_baseFare * 2 + (df.kt_dacc_skims_out + df.kt_degr_skims_inb) * driveSpeed / 60 * TNC_single_costPerMile + (df.kt_dacc_skims_out + df.kt_degr_skims_inb) * TNC_single_costPerMinute, TNC_single_costMinimum) * 100

Label: util_TNC_TRANSIT_Person_is_less_than_10_years_old
Description: TNC_TRANSIT - Person is less than 10 years old

Label: util_TNC_Single_Cost
Expression: @ivt_cost_multiplier * df.ivot * np.maximum(TNC_single_baseFare * 2 + (df.s2_dist_skims_out + df.s2_dist_skims_inb) * TNC_single_costPerMile + (df.s2_time_skims_out + df.s2_time_skims_inb) * TNC_single_costPerMinute, TNC_single_costMinimum) * 100

Label: util_TNC_Shared_Cost
Expression: @ivt_cost_multiplier * df.ivot * np.maximum(TNC_shared_baseFare * 2 + (df.s2_dist_skims_out + df.s2_dist_skims_inb) * TNC_shared_costPerMile + (df.s2_time_skims_out + df.s2_time_skims_inb) * TNC_shared_costPerMinute, TNC_shared_costMinimum) * 100
